title: Get Screen Capture
body: Allow screen capture to be taken from background task OR through mdm protocol.  This is useful for techs using mdm systems - for example if a user has an issue and calls their tech support, they can request a screen capture and help them resolve.

comments.body: We need a way to capture the current screen (as is displayed to the user) in a UWP application or UWP application background task in realtime, e.g. as is possible in Win32.
I want to capture the screen of the desktop and other of third party apps from within an UWP app. This would allow screencasts, remote access and similar use cases.
which keys may i press on UWP Desktop?
Press Windows + Power in WP8, or in Windows Phone 8.1 Vol Up + Power
